request.description:
Returns access token and authenticated user email, name and default password status.
If user.is_default_password is true, User must change password to access routes that require authentication.

item.name:
Logout
Log the user out (Invalidate the token).

request.description: @@queryParam all Whether to logout from all devices. Example true

item.name:
Trash
Fetch Deleted Customers
Display a listing of Customers from trash.

request.description:
You may include search term and number of items per page (pp) Default is 100
Example: http://localhost/api/customers/trash?page=1&&pp=100&&search=your_search_term

item.name:
Vehicles
Show vehicles registered to this customer

Fetch Customers
Display a listing of Customers
You may include search term and number of items per page (pp) Default is 100
Example: http://localhost/api/customers?page=1&&pp=100&&search=your_search_term

Store
Store a newly created customer in storage.

Show
Display the specified customer details.

Update
Update the specified customer in storage.

Fetch Deleted roles Roles
You may include search term and number of items per page (pp) Default is 100
Example: http://localhost/api/roles/trash?page=1&&pp=100&&search=your_search_term

Fetch Roles
You may include search term and number of items per page (pp) Default is 100
Example: http://localhost/api/roles?page=1&&pp=100&&search=your_search_term

Fetch Deleted Suppliers
Display a listing of Suppliers from trash.

request.description:
You may include search term and number of items per page (pp) Default is 100
Example: http://localhost/api/suppliers/trash?page=1&&pp=100&&search=your_search_term

item.name:
Fetch Suppliers
Display a listing of Suppliers.

request.description:

Example: http://localhost/api/suppliers?page=1&&pp=100&&search=your_search_term

item.name: Store a newly created Supplier in db.
Update the specified supplier in storage.
Return an empty response simply to trigger the storage of the CSRF cookie in the browser.
Display a listing of the resource.
Store a newly created resource in storage.
Update the specified resource in storage.
Remove the specified resource from storage.

Fetch Staffs
You may include search term and number of staffs per page (pp) Default is 100
Example: http://localhost/api/staffs?page=1&&pp=100&&search=your_search_term
